snippet: It wasn’t until dawn on Thursday that the Hess Corporation settled a proxy fight waged by Elliott Management. | Laurene Powell Jobs is tiptoeing into the public sphere to push her philanthropic agenda. | Fred Eckert, a onetime Goldman Sachs partner...
abstract: It wasn’t until dawn on Thursday that the Hess Corporation settled a proxy fight waged by Elliott Management. | Laurene Powell Jobs is tiptoeing into the public sphere to push her philanthropic agenda. | Fred Eckert, a onetime Goldman Sachs partner who lost his fortune, is trying to make a comeback. | Andrew Mason, Groupon’s former chief, has returned to the spotlight.
